Package Mediator

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • Mediator.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, RemoteModel, utility.observer.listener.GeneralListener<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>, utility.observer.listener.LocalListener<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>, utility.observer.subject.GeneralSubject<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>, utility.observer.subject.RemoteSubject<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>
    public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements RemoteModel, utility.observer.listener.LocalListener<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>
    Server side mediator class that implements the RemoteModel and delegates to the ServerModel, and therefore to the ServerModelManager.
    Version:
    3.0 - 01.06.21
    Author:
    Group 1

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Server​(ServerModel model)
      Constructor initializing the serverModel instance variable, setting up PropertyChangeHandler, starting Registry and Server, as well as adding itself as a listener to the Server Model.

      • addListener

        public boolean addListener​(utility.observer.listener.GeneralListener<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> listener,
                           java.lang.String... propertyNames)
        Description copied from interface: utility.observer.subject.RemoteSubject
        Adding a listener either to all events or to one or more property names.
        Specified by:
        addListener in interface utility.observer.subject.GeneralSubject<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>
        Specified by:
        addListener in interface utility.observer.subject.RemoteSubject<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to be added
        propertyNames - a var-args list of property names. If empty, then the listener should be added as a lister for all events.
        Returns:
        true if the listener has been added. It is optional if this return true if the listener has been added to at least one of the property names or if it successfully has been added to all listed

      • removeListener

        public boolean removeListener​(utility.observer.listener.GeneralListener<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> listener,
                              java.lang.String... propertyNames)
        Description copied from interface: utility.observer.subject.RemoteSubject
        Removing a listener either from all events or from one or more property names.
        Specified by:

        Specified by:
        removeListener in interface utility.observer.subject.RemoteSubject<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to be removed
        propertyNames - a var-args list of property names. If empty, then the listener should be removed as a lister for all events.
        Returns:
        true if the listener has been removed. It is optional if this return true if the listener has been removed from at least one of the property names or if it successfully has been removed from all listed
